meanings.definition: In a manner that is not conducive to good health.
meanings.sent1: She ate unhealthily by consuming too many sugary snacks.
meanings.sent2: He knew he was living unhealthily when he skipped breakfast every day.
meanings.sent3: The cat unhealthily chased its tail in circles, trying to catch it.
meanings.sent4: The vines unhealthily twisted around the tree, blocking its sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds hung unhealthily in the sky, threatening rain.

meanings.definition: In a way that is harmful to one's well-being.
meanings.sent1: She slept unhealthily by staying up late every night.
meanings.sent2: He felt unhealthily stressed out from work and needed a break.
meanings.sent3: The clown unhealthily juggled too many balls at once, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: The rumors spread unhealthily through the small town, causing panic.
meanings.sent5: The weeds unhealthily overtook the garden, choking out the flowers.
